text: ninakku mump niravadhi dutanmare nam niyeagiccittunt. avaril cilarute caritram ninakku nam vivariccutannirikkunnu. vivariccutaratta cilarumunt. oru daivadutannum allahuvinre anumatiyeateyallate oru drstantavum keantuvaranavilla. allahuvinre kalpana vannal n'yayamaya vidhittirppuntavum. ateate asatyavadikal keatum nastattilakappetum
